overview: NOEL is filmed entirely in the beautiful Okinawa. The story is a funny mix of action, comedy and slapstick misunderstandings that weave together around the firm will of an old lady to commit a murder and the young lad (a professional murder) who’s asked to train her. Kaoru (Taira Tomi) meet Mikasa (TAKA) with this purpose, to be taught & trained on how to murder an old rival in love of her own youth, Hei. After this *grievous but hilarious* training and the attempt to murder Hei a shocking incident occurs. Mikasa becomes the target of another young murder (Suga Takamasa) who held him responsible for the death of his beloved sister…
title: Noel
